Option: general.debug

This option enables you to turn on/off the debug mode. When enabled error messages will present a back trace of where the error occured with file, function and line number. This option is set to false by default for security reasons and shold not be enabled in a production environment.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['general.debug'] = true;
